entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The main character, a wizard who is using the Put-Outer to extinguish street lamps.

entities.name: put-outter
entities.description: A device used by Dumbledore to turn off street lamps. It is described as being clicked multiple times.

entities.name: street lamp
entities.description: The street lamps that are being turned off by the Put-Outer. They are described as going out with a 'little pop'.

entities.name: cat
entities.description: A cat watching Dumbledore from a distance, its eyes visible in the dark.

entities.name: mrs dursley
entities.description: The wife of Vernon Dursley, who is mentioned as being unable to see what's happening on the pavement due to the lack of light.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is using the Put-Outer to turn off street lamps. This is described as him clicking it multiple times.
Dumbledore is turning off the street lamps using the Put-Outer. This is described as them going out with a 'little pop'.
The cat is watching Dumbledore from a distance, its eyes visible in the dark.
